mainSequence.step: Dataset Developer requests Archetype Tool to create dataset package
Archetype Tool generates dataset template and provides it to the Developer
Dataset Developer defines dataset type (Schemas, Configurations, Code)
Dataset Developer uploads dataset package to Build System
Build System validates package integrity and compatibility
Build System stores validated dataset package in Dataset Repository and acknowledges storage to Developer
Build System notifies Developer about successful packaging and storage
Dataset Developer deploys dataset type for application integration in the Application Ecosystem
Application Ecosystem integrates the dataset type and confirms successful deployment and integration to Developer
